name: Lost in Space (itch) (Raphael Schaaf)
description:
MADE FOR 0HOUR GAMEJAM 2015!

Your ship got lost after a space storm, now you're trying to get home...

Use left/right arrow keys or the sides of your touchscreen to activate your boosters, get to the portal and don't touch red stuff.

I didn't have enough time to add sound or more levels during the jam, but I think I'm gonna keep working on it for a couple of days and make a real game out of this prototype...
